text:
Grande is a fashion designer now

Singer Ariana Grande has turned into a fashion designer after teaming up with the company Lipsy London. The 22-year-old and the fashion company have created a show-stopping spring collection that will be available online at Lipsy.com and in the U.K. stores from March 2. After the news was made official, The ‘Bang Bang’ hit-maker took to Twitter to thank her fans and wrote, “@LipsyLondon my babes are gonna love this. Thank you so much.” The fun, flirty and iconic collection with dresses and wand skirts start at $51, while tops are priced around $46 and are perfectly complemented by Ariana’s 30+ Lipsy jewelry range.— ANI
title: Ariana Grande is fashion designer now
